title: Looking for very active Mid and Support for a ranked team
body:
Hey guys we are looking for a very active mid and support. We are flexible in what days we play, however it is irregular until we have a set day or two. If you are on every night like half of the team is we want you! We are an average of Gold rank together and bronze 1 straight out of placements, we will climb with the aim learning and getting better individually and as a team. It is essential to add either me or ColdBlood or even both and then message us, we cant keep track of everyone. It is also essential to have a working headset and Curse Voice. 

I am aware this is my third or so ad on these boards with numerous people adding me for a select role. Note that i can only accept two people however will talk to all that add me, rank does not essentially matter only your availability. Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Support main, can play any support champ/style. 

20 y/o just finished uni so I will have alot of free time this year to smash out league whenever possible. Can be free pretty much any night, if you want to add me and play some normals to see how I play feel free.  

No real ranked history since I have been so busy at uni last few years. 

Username : XxSneakyBeakyxX  ( joke name obviously :v )

Mid and support I am your man

Live in Perth 

Play as often as I can. 

Only B4 atm but try me out

I main mid but can play both!

MeIbourne
I can both Mid and Support (Mid is preferable) if there is still a slot. Play quite often
I can support add me Blutino
